title: David Bai
meta_description: Cambridge Lecture Notes taken by Zhiyuan Bai (David).
main_content: Cambridge Lecture Notes I would like to thank everyone who has helped the perfection of these notes by way of correcting and giving feedbacks. If you think any of these notes can be improved in some direction, or have spotted any mistakes or typos, you are most welcome to let me know . All materials listed here are actively maintained. For obvious reasons, notes that were taken more recently are usually better written. TeX codes of the documents are available upon request. Part IA Michaelmas Differential Equations by Dr. J. R. Taylor (Michaelmas 2019) Groups by Dr. O. Randal-Williams (Michaelmas 2019) Numbers and Sets by Prof. I. B. Leader (Michaelmas 2019) Vectors and Matrices by Dr. J. M. Evans (Michaelmas 2019) Lent Analysis I by Prof. J. Rassmussen (Lent 2020) Dynamics and Relativity by Prof. P. H. Haynes (Lent 2020) Probability by Dr. P. Sousi (Lent 2020) Vector Calculus by Dr. A. Ashton (Lent 2020) Part IB Michaelmas Analysis and Topology by Dr. A. Zsák (Michaelmas 2019) Linear Algebra by Prof. P. Raphael (Michaelmas 2020) Markov Chains by Dr. R. Bauerschmidt (Michaelmas 2020) Methods by Prof. E. P. S. Shellard (Michaelmas 2020) Quantum Mechanics by Dr. M. Ubiali (Michaelmas 2020) Lent Complex Analysis by Prof. N. Wickramasekera (Lent 2020) Complex Methods by Dr. U. Sperhake (Lent 2021) Geometry by Prof. I. Smith (Lent 2021) Groups, Rings and Modules by Dr. T. A. Fisher (Lent 2020) Numerical Analysis by Prof. C. B. Schönlieb (Lent 2021) Statistics by Dr. S. Bacallado (Lent 2021) Easter Optimisation by Dr. M. R. Tehranchi (Easter 2020) Variational Principles by Dr. M. Dunajski (Easter 2020) Part II Michaelmas Algebraic Topology by Prof. M. Gross (Michaelmas 2020) Galois Theory by Prof. I. Grojnowski (Michaelmas 2021) Linear Analysis by Prof. C. Mouhot (Michaelmas 2021) Number Theory by Dr. J. Wolf (Michaelmas 2020) Probability and Measure by Prof. R. Nickl (Michaelmas 2020) Representation Theory by Dr. S. Wadsley (Michaelmas 2021) Riemann Surfaces by Dr. H. Wilton (Michaelmas 2020) Stochastic Financial Models by Dr. M. Tehranchi (Michaelmas 2021) The following notes are taken by Nicky Wong Galois Theory by Prof. I. Grojnowski (Michaelmas 2020) Linear Analysis by Prof. C. Scholl (Lent 2021) Part III Michaelmas Algebraic Geometry by Dr. D. Ranganathan (Michaelmas 2022) Algebraic Topology by Prof. J. Rasmussen (Michaelmas 2022) Commutative Algebra by Dr. O.
